subject: From: ALDO JOHAN RAMIREZ BAR
body:
From: ALDO JOHAN RAMIREZ BARBOSA <

Sent: Tuesday, April 14, 2020  
To: 
info@representative.com
 <info@representative.com>
Subject: Our company is interested in your service as a North America Representative for our company with Monthly salary and commission inclusive, do advise if interested.

subject: Re:   From: ALDO JOHAN RAMIREZ BAR
body:
Dear Marykate,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am very excited about this opportunity to live and work in the United States! 

Could you please provide more details on the next steps I need to take? Also, could you confirm if there are any restrictions on where I can live in the US once I have my green card?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Evelyn
